Method Detail

dealCard

public int dealCard()
Randomly deals a card from the deck (based on deck size)

initializeDeck

public void initializeDeck()
Uses a list of card values. Where the ACE is set to 11 to poplulate an arraylist with the correct distribution of cards and values

playGame

public void playGame()
Implements the game mechanics of blackJack for two players

printDeck

public void printDeck()
Used to visually check what cards are in the deck. Not needed for game implementation

resetDeck

public void resetDeck()
Creates a new (empty) arrayList to hold card values. It will then use the initialize deck method to get 52 cards with the correct numeric distribution
